reviewText: Since City of Angels and Michael are two of my favorite movies, I definitely wanted to own them. But, with limited storage space, I don't have a huge area to store my DVD collection. So, this double-feature disc fit the bill.The only problem with these types of discs is that they have to be handled more carefully to avoid scratching either side of the disc.
summary: Saves Space on your DVD Shelf
Title: Double Feature: City of Angels / Michael

reviewText: So, if you are feeling absolutely down about the world and need a good cry this is the double feature to buy.  Between the two you'll clog your sinuses pretty quickly.  Absolutely great movies though, and the soundtrack to City of Angels is an all time favourite.
Title: Double Feature: City of Angels / Michael

reviewText: Good movies, by 2 top of the line actors!
Title: Double Feature: City of Angels / Michael

reviewText: I bought this because I mostly wanted City of Angels in widescreen, and this was actually cheaper than buying the DVD with only City of Angels.First of all you would expect both movies to be in widescreen format from the description on the Amazon product page, but only City of Angels is.Second, there is this big textual description on the back of the DVD about all the amazing extras about City of Angels. However, when you try to watch them, it says they are on the B side of the DVD. The only thing on the B side of the DVD is Michael. I suspect they took the A side from the regular wide screen edition of City of Angels, and instead of that B side just threw on Michael.I like both movies, and for both movies the price is pretty good. But it doesn't excuse the incorrect marketing. It only misleads the buyer.
summary: Deal sounds better than it is
Title: Double Feature: City of Angels / Michael

reviewText: I relate well t both shows in a very close and personal manner. Well. Done. No Prob here. Tom. Cheers!
summary: These will never grow old for me to enjoy watching...
Title: Double Feature: City of Angels / Michael

reviewText: I have ordered this product from Amazon.com which I consider a great buy. It has two movies, City of Angels & Michael on one dvd. The price is great and if you are a fan of John Travolta & Nicolas Cage these are two movies that are a little different for both actors.The subject matter is Angels for both movies, and both actors made these movies before they started making action/drama movies with lots of violence. I guess it was a kinder & more gentle time.
summary: A great Two for One price!
Title: Double Feature: City of Angels / Michael

reviewText: these were good movie's to watch with the whole family you can't go wrong with the double feature's for the money
Title: Double Feature: City of Angels / Michael

reviewText: Two extremely fine films, Cage and Ryan extremely good in Angels, Travolta great in Michael. Twin successes for minimum investment

reviewText: I really just wanted City of Angels but thought why not get two for one.  This was a good deal.  Love City of Angels....good story and like Meg and Nick when they were at this point in there careers.
Title: Double Feature: City of Angels / Michael

reviewText: Before I bought this disc with double movies I've never seen them before. My husband and I just finished watching both movies and we liked it.City of Angel's is a touching movie. Seth being an angel goes to the hospital to take a soul back with him. That is when he meets Maggy, who is a doctor. Seth falls in love with Maggy. He shows him self to her and becomes part of her life. Seth also hangs around Mr. Messenger because he is one of Maggy's patients. Seth finds out Mr. Messenger use to be an angel, but he jumped off a building to become human. Because he also fall in love with a human, who is his wife. Maggy finds out Seth is an angel at the same time Maggy's doctor boy friend propose to her. She tells Seth, who she is in love with, that she can't deal with him not being able to feel her touch but she is able to feel his. She tells him she was proposed to and is leaving to Tahoe to get married. Seth doesn't take the news very well and decided to jump off a building to become human. Once he is human who goes far to find Maggy alone in a cabin in Tahoe. They share a romantic night together. The next day Maggy rides her bike to a little local story for groceries. Maggy get's distracted with the fresh air. A truck caring wood longs crosses her path. Maggy hits the truck and dies in Seth's arms. It is very sad that Seth gave up being an angel for the love of his life and looses her the next day. Very touching movie that you must see.Michael isn't an ordinary angel. He smokes, drinks, sleeps with woman, and is a total crack up. Three news paper reporters, go to a small town where Michael is living with an old lady. The old lady dies and Michael sets off with the three people to Chicago. Michael requested to stop to see some crazy stuff on the way. He even get's in a fight at a bar and everyone has to sleep in jail. Michael purpose is to help two people fall in love with each other. The ending was a little boring. But the beginning was a total crack up. You must see this movie.
Title: Double Feature: City of Angels / Michael

reviewText: i received this movie dvd months ago & rated it at that time, see earlier posting/review & will order again in future,  thanks in advance
Title: Double Feature: City of Angels / Michael

Title: Double Feature: City of Angels / Michael
